title: entangl3d
description: A visuospatial explorer for exploring activity within The Dark Forest.

title: Collective Filter
description: Surveying relationships between cryptoart and performance art and introducing a data performance that involves creators and collectors as awkward product recommendations.

title: Rothko Recovery
description: ...an amazing NFT project on Ethereum called “Rothko on Pennies” by Yigit Duman and the events surrounding it — including my own participation.

title: On-Chain Garden
description: A little contract 'hack' for an on-chain experiment 'Rabbit Hole' by Monas. The contract overcomes an on-chain game constraint that lets a community of seeders to a contract 'garden' grow their holdings together.

title: Recursive Gutenberg
description: 0xDEAFBEEF's 'Moveable Type,' systems & symbols alter culture & consciousness; in the spirit of the cultural ratchet, a second-layer symbols compounding symbols.

title: Table View of 0xchain.art
description: Preserving an on-chain dataset of 0xchain.art with permanent-ish ENS site.
